content.question: The slides show two views of the same building.Identify the building. Analyze how innovative elements were used in both the design and construction of the building.

frqParts.text: The slides show two views of the same building.Identify the building. Analyze how innovative elements were used in both the design and construction of the building.

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
